Body.Content:
We are announcing the ability to review AI prompts, inputs, and responses with validation station in AI Builder. This feature will reach general availability on September 15, 2025.

How does this affect me?
When users send feedback on AI generated content, makers use that feedback to provide a more accurate response. The validation station is a human-in-the-loop feature that allows users to provide feedback, provides makers notifications when feedback is available, and allows makers to act on the feedback.

What action do I need to take?
This message is for awareness and no action is required.

If you would like more information on this feature, please visit the Review AI-generated content with validation station learn article.

Title: AI Builder â€“ Review AI generated content with validation station
